attributes.action: resign and make way for Joanna Lumley to be PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the embarrasing defeat over the Gurkha's right to stay in the UK, not to mention the incompetent handling of the economic crisis, etc, we all think in our best interests that Gordon Brown should resign immediately so Joanna Lumley can be Prime Minister.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
